item.title: AWS CLI Advanced Options
item.description: AWS CLI Advanced Options # Define an endpoint with AWS CLI # AWS CLI v1.x Installing pluginawscli-plugin-endpoint will also install the AWS CLI v1 Install awscli-plugin-endpoint plugin: ~ % pip3 install awscli-plugin-endpoint Configure plugin in your ~/.aws/config file: ~ % aws configure set plugins.endpoint awscli_plugin_endpoint AWS CLI v2.x Install the AWS CLI v2.x Install awscli-plugin-endpoint plugin: ~ % pip3 install --no-deps awscli-plugin-endpoint Remember the path where the plugin is installed, you will need it in the next step.
